alert.note: Alert for Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains; Tooele and Rush Valleys (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 24 at 3:22PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of east central Tooele County through 345 PM MDT... At 322 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 9 miles southeast of Delle to 6 miles southeast of Skull Valley. Movement was northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Tooele, Grantsville, Tooele Army Depot and Erda. This includes Interstate 80 in Utah between mile markers 79 and 90. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...<40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains; Tooele and Rush Valleys
